#id=1
#text=Yesterday , I decided to bake a simple white cake for my friend 's birthday .
#id=2

#text=I went the store to purchase all the ingredients I would need : sugar , butter , eggs , all-purpose flour , baking soda , milk and vanilla extract for the cake , along with powdered sugar to make a basic vanilla frosting .
#id=3
#text=Once I arrived home , I preheat my oven to 350 degrees .
#id=4
#text=I measured the amount of each ingredient I would need .
#id=5
#text=In my mixer , I combined all of the cake ingredients to form a smooth batter .
#id=6
#text=I poured the batter into a pan that was coated with cooking spray .
#id=7
#text=I baked the cake for 35 minutes and turned off the oven .
#id=8
#text=I let the cake cool for several hours .
#id=9
#text=While waiting , I used powdered sugar , butter , milk and vanilla to make the vanilla frosting .
#text=Once the cake had cooked , I decorated it with the frosting .
#text=I decided to add a couple strawberries on top to make the cake look nicer .
